description: Run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong between all node pairs in the selected nodes, on which Intel MPI or Microsoft MPI (only available for Windows nodes) should be installed as prerequisite.

parameters.name: Packet size
parameters.description: Specify the size(as exponent of 2) of transfer messages used in testing. Sizes from 2^0 to 2^22 bytes will be included in testing if the value is -1.

description.2018: The Intel MPI 2018, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.0.128 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.0.128, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong.
description.2018 Update 1: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 1, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.1.163 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.1.156, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong.
description.2018 Update 2: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 2, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.2.199 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.2.185, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong.
description.2018 Update 3: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 3, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.3.222 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.3.210, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong.
description.2018 Update 4: The Intel MPI 2018 Update 4, installed in /opt/intel/impi/2018.4.274 or C:\Program Files (x86)\IntelSWTools\mpi\2018.4.274, will be used to run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong.

parameters.name: Use Microsoft MPI on Windows nodes

description.Yes: Run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong by Microsoft MPI on Windows nodes
description.No: Run Intel MPI Benchmark IMB-MPI1 Pingpong by Intel MPI on Windows nodes

parameters.name: Max runtime
parameters.description: Specify the max time in seconds the test could run.
